alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 10:13AM EST until January 01 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Chesterfield and Marlboro Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Wateree River At Lake Wateree affecting Lancaster, Kershaw and Fairfield Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wateree River at Lake Wateree. * WHEN...From this evening to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 100.4 feet, The piers on the Wildlife Road bridge over Singleton Creek become submerged. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 99.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 99.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tonight to a crest of 100.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage on Sunday. - Flood stage is 100.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Most flooding deaths occur in vehicles. Never drive through a flooded roadway or around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 415 AM EST.
